body:
- Add intel-oneapi-vtune package to Spack list
It will install [Intel® VTune™ Profiler](https://software.intel.com/content/www/us/en/develop/tools/oneapi/components/vtune-profiler.html) in driverless mode. Provided instructions in description
- Remove 'danvev' from the maintainer list as I'm no longer responsible for Intel integration to Spack 

FYI @rscohn2
title: Add intel-oneapi-vtune package
